title: ACMI Presents: A Life Exposed: Robyn Beeche
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture producers and directors - Australia
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction - Australia
abstract: In this ACMI event, writer and former editor of Vogue Australia, Kirstie Clements, leads a discussion between Robyn Beeche, renowned Australian photographer, and Lesley Branagan, who directed "A Life Exposed" - a 2013 documentary about Beeche's life and work.
description: The 2013 documentary "A Life Exposed" (directed by Lesley Branagan) explores the life and work of Australian photographer Robyn Beeche. In this ACMI event, writer and former editor of Vogue Australia, Kirstie Clements, leads a discussion between Beeche and Branagan.
